db:abstract.db:para: Shows how to use the QWebSocket and QWebSocketServer classes for creating a minimalistic chat application over the WebSocket protocol.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT = websockets
TARGET = chatserver CONFIG += console CONFIG -= app_bundle
TEMPLATE = app
SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ chatserver.cpp
HEADERS += \ chatserver.h
EXAMPLE_FILES += chatclient.html
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/websockets/simplechat INSTALLS += target
